job.title: Freelancer
job.desc: Starting my career as a software development engineer by freelancing, I have accumulated experiences that are said to be useful above a software engineer. I learned the methods of working on common operating systems, from working with the terminal to executing on the user interface. Create content, design and edit images or videos.
